@VPS_AI Blockchains require computational power for performing cryptographic calculations for mining crypto, such as Bitcoin & Ethereum, as well as for validating & securing transactions on the network. GPUs, with their ability to perform parallel operations are well-suited for this task

France wants to mine Bitcoin.
Not ban it. Not regulate it to death. Mine it.

French lawmakers now estimate the country could earn over $150M/year just by supporting Bitcoin mining operations.
And this isn’t a fringe proposal—it’s in the official Parliamentary report.
